title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Thailand 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has constant over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2022 to 2023.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 3.65 was reached at Year 2022, and 2023
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 3.65 was reported at Year 2022, and 2023
